author: parithosh
content:
Sam is asleep and could expand on it more, but it seems like this PR i deployed didn't really help nimbus: https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/pull/7043 (epoch basically tracks before and after we deployed it)

Current working theory is that nimbus having issues in inclusion is tanking the other per client inclusion rates. But this is still a naieve reading, no explanation as to how or if the reading is even fully correct.
